casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Laurri Joann JOSEPH, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157579
COA: 342148 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the March 2, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, it appearing to this Court that the case of People v. Ames (Docket No. 156077), --- Mich. ----, 911 N.W.2d 804 (2018) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.
